verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> I waited <S%H6960><s%> patiently <S%H6960><s%> for the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and he inclined <S%H5186><s%> to me, and heard <S%H8085><s%> my cry. <S%H7775><s%>

He brought <S%H5927><s%> me up also out of an horrible <S%H7588><s%> pit, <S%H953><s%> out of the miry <S%H3121><s%> clay, <S%H2916><s%> and set <S%H6965><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> on a rock, <S%H5553><s%> and established <S%H3559><s%> my goings. <S%H838><s%>

And he has put <S%H5414><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> song <S%H7892><s%> in my mouth, <S%H6310><s%> even praise <S%H8416><s%> to our God: <S%H430><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> it, and fear, <S%H3372><s%> and shall trust <S%H982><s%> in the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is that man <S%H1397><s%> that makes <S%H7760><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> his trust, <S%H4009><s%> and respects <S%H6437><s%> not the proud, <S%H7295><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> such as turn <S%H7750><s%> aside <S%H7847><s%> to lies. <S%H3576><s%>

Many, <S%H7227><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> are your wonderful <S%H6381><s%> works which you have done, <S%H6213><s%> and your thoughts <S%H4284><s%> which are to us-ward: <S%H413><s%> they cannot <S%H408><s%> be reckoned up in order <S%H6186><s%> to you: if I would declare <S%H5046><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> of them, they are more <S%H6105><s%> than can be numbered. <S%H5608><s%>

Sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and offering <S%H4503><s%> you did not desire; <S%H2654><s%> my ears <S%H241><s%> have you opened: <S%H3738><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering and sin <S%H2401><s%> offering have you not required. <S%H7592><s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> said <S%H559><s%> I, See, <S%H2009><s%> I come: <S%H935><s%> in the volume <S%H4039><s%> of the book <S%H5612><s%> it is written <S%H3789><s%> of me,
I delight <S%H2654><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> your will, <S%H7522><s%> O my God: <S%H430><s%> yes, your law <S%H8451><s%> is within <S%H8432><s%> my heart. <S%H4578><s%>

I have preached <S%H1319><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%> in the great <S%H7227><s%> congregation: <S%H6951><s%> see, <S%H2009><s%> I have not refrained <S%H3607><s%> my lips, <S%H8193><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> you know. <S%H3045><s%>

I have not hid <S%H3680><s%> your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> my heart; <S%H3820><s%> I have declared <S%H559><s%> your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and your salvation: <S%H8668><s%> I have not concealed <S%H3582><s%> your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and your truth <S%H571><s%> from the great <S%H7227><s%> congregation. <S%H6951><s%>

Withhold <S%H3607><s%> not you your tender mercies <S%H7356><s%> from me, O LORD: <S%H3068><s%> let your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and your truth <S%H571><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> preserve <S%H5341><s%> me.

For innumerable <S%H369><s%> <S%H4557><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> have compassed <S%H661><s%> me about: my iniquities <S%H5771><s%> have taken <S%H5381><s%> hold <S%H5381><s%> on me, so that I am not able <S%H3201><s%> to look <S%H7200><s%> up; they are more <S%H6105><s%> than the hairs <S%H8185><s%> of my head: <S%H7218><s%> therefore my heart <S%H3820><s%> fails <S%H5800><s%> me.
Be pleased, <S%H7521><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> me: O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> make haste <S%H2363><s%> to help <S%H5833><s%> me.

Let them be ashamed <S%H954><s%> and confounded <S%H2659><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%> to destroy <S%H5595><s%> it; let them be driven <S%H5472><s%> backward <S%H268><s%> and put to shame <S%H3637><s%> that wish <S%H2655><s%> me evil. <S%H7451><s%>
Let them be desolate <S%H8074><s%> for a reward <S%H6118><s%> of their shame <S%H1322><s%> that say <S%H559><s%> to me, Aha, <S%H253><s%> aha. <S%H253><s%>

Let all <S%H3605><s%> those that seek <S%H1245><s%> you rejoice <S%H7797><s%> and be glad in you: let such as love <S%H157><s%> your salvation <S%H8668><s%> say <S%H559><s%> continually, <S%H8548><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> be magnified. <S%H1431><s%>

But I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy; <S%H34><s%> yet the Lord <S%H136><s%> thinks <S%H2803><s%> on me: you are my help <S%H5833><s%> and my deliverer; <S%H6403><s%> make no <S%H408><s%> tarrying, <S%H309><s%> O my God. <S%H430><s%>
